line_1: And girls, who heed not dress, are skill'd in gin:
line_2: Boys, in their first-stol'n rags, to swear begin,

line_1: Subtile and slow, her emblematic gin!
line_2: Still may yon spider round your pages spin,

line_1: And Wisdom to avoid the Cat, and Gin.

line_2: Now wholsome laws young senators bring in

line_1: Tobacco take, and beg for gin.
line_2: From mouths that with most ghastly grin,
